verbs.description: President Trump [V: has] canceled a June 12 summit with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un , citing ' tremendous anger and open hostility ' in a recent statement .
[ARG0: President Trump] has [V: canceled] [ARG1: a June 12 summit with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] , [ARGM-ADV: citing ' tremendous anger and open hostility ' in a recent statement] .
[ARG0: President Trump] has canceled a June 12 summit with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un , [V: citing] [ARG1: ' tremendous anger and open hostility '] [ARGM-LOC: in a recent statement] .
